details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version identification - PDF/A Identification Schema property rev.
details.description: Property rev of the PDF/A Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfaid

rule.description: Property rev of the PDF/A Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfaid

error.message: Property rev of the PDF/A Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1
